507530.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rippers Resurrected Map Pack (Savage Worlds)
507530.description:
A set of full-color, detailed maps for your Rippers Resurrected or gothic horror game.

Also included is the World of the Rippers map which is annotated and ready for your Rippers team to explore on this gorgeous, full-color, detailed digital image.
This Map Pack includes:
  • country house and grounds
  • ancient tomb and burial chamber
  • Eastern European courtyard
  • lodge
  • Urban Alleys
  • Annotated World of the Rippers map
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any Ruleset (Savage Worlds v4 and Rippers Resurrected suggested).
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
